biocontainers.name: jamm
biocontainers.summary: Jamm is a peak finder for ngs datasets (chip-seq, atac-seq, dnase-seq..etc.) that can integrate replicates and assign peak boundaries accurately.

biotools.summary: Peak finder for NGS datasets that can integrate replicates and assign peak boundaries accurately.
